title: EnrichLayer Person Profile
author: Andrew Mayfield
description: Get detailed LinkedIn profile data using EnrichLayer API
overviewMarkdown:
## EnrichLayer Person Profile

Get comprehensive professional profile data from LinkedIn URLs including work history, education, skills, and certifications.

### Setup:
1. Get your API key from [EnrichLayer Dashboard](https://enrichlayer.com/dashboard)
2. Enter it in the plugin settings

### Usage:
"Enrich the profile https://www.linkedin.com/in/williamhgates"

### Cost: 1-2 credits per request
